verses.verse: A Psalm. Oh sing <WH7891> unto Jehovah <WH3068> a new <WH2319> song <WH7892>; For he hath done <WH6213> marvellous things <WH6381>: His right hand <WH3225>, and his holy <WH6944> arm <WH2220>, hath wrought salvation for him <WH3467>.
Jehovah <WH3068> hath made known <WH3045> his salvation <WH3444>: His righteousness <WH6666> hath he openly showed <WH1540> in the sight <WH5869> of the nations <WH1471>.

He hath remembered <WH2142> his lovingkindness <WH2617> and his faithfulness <WH530> toward the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>: All the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776> have seen <WH7200> the salvation <WH3444> of our God <WH430>.
Make a joyful noise <WH7321> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, all the earth <WH776>: Break forth and sing <WH2167> for joy <WH7442>, yea <WH2167>, sing praises.
Sing <WH2167> praises unto Jehovah <WH3068> with the harp <WH3658>; With the harp <WH3658> and the voice <WH6963> of melody <WH2172>.
With trumpets <WH2689> and sound <WH6963> of cornet <WH7782> Make a joyful noise <WH7321> before <WH6440> the King <WH4428>, Jehovah <WH3068>.
Let the sea <WH3220> roar <WH7481>, and the fulness <WH4393> thereof <WH8398>; The world, and they that dwell therein <WH3427>;
Let the floods <WH5104> clap <WH4222> their hands <WH3709>; Let the hills <WH2022> sing for joy <WH7442> together <WH3162>

Before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>; For he cometh <WH935> to judge <WH8199> the earth <WH776>: He will judge <WH8199> the world <WH8398> with righteousness <WH6664>, And the peoples <WH5971> with equity <WH4339>.
